definition: to go against the wind/contrary wind/a headwind
contrary/opposite/backwards/to go against/to oppose/to betray/to rebel

sentences.english: Restraint is necessary counter-part to the winds of opposition.
sentences.chinese: 逆风而行时，束缚是不可或缺的。

sentences.english: To a crazy ship all winds are contrary.
sentences.chinese: 对于一只盲目航行的船来说，所有方向的风都是逆风。

sentences.english: The winds were contrary;we had to beat about for two days.
sentences.chinese: 正碰上逆风，我们的船只好迎斜风行驶了两天。

sentences.english: There exits an upwind zone in front of fire front.
sentences.chinese: 在火头前方存在逆风区。

sentences.english: They laid the sails aback so as to stay on course in the storm wind.
sentences.chinese: 他们使帆成为逆风向以便在暴风中保持既定航道。
因此方帆船无法逆风航行。

sentences.english: The ship is beating against the wind.
Stronger trade relations between China and India still face some headwinds.
sentences.chinese: 中国和印度之间较强的贸易关系依旧面临着一些逆风。

sentences.english: The sailboat was beating along the coast.
Christian rises against the winds of adversity.
sentences.chinese: 靠著上帝，基督徒能逆风而行。

sentences.english: If the wind changes direction, why resist it?
sentences.chinese: 要是风改变了方向，难道我们就应该逆风而上么？

sentences.english: No need to add yards for approach shot, unless wind is on.
sentences.chinese: 第二杆的码数打足就好，不必多加，除非逆风。

sentences.english: The ship tacked against the wind.
A headwind-going vehicle is made of the pulleys used in curtain track, and some routine things.
sentences.chinese: 利用窗帘轨道中的滑轮和日常生活用品制作了逆风车。

sentences.english: Sailing was rough yesterday; we sailed against the wind all day.
sentences.chinese: 昨天的航行并不顺利，我们一天都逆风航行。

sentences.english: The wind lifts the ship up to higher heights.
sentences.chinese: 逆风会把飞机抬得高些。

definition: to make a comeback/(of a doctor's assessment of the gender of a fetus) to turn out to be wrong
to respond to an assault by killing one's assailant
under full sail/going as fast as possible
to turn defeat into victory (idiom); to turn the tide
to be out of (political) office/to be out of power
opening (chess etc)/early stage of game, match, work, activity etc
